title: ColdEmailGPT template to generate cold email
original_prompt: Act as a experienced startup founder I will provide the goal of this email, my context and the receiver's information. You will provide an email. The email needs to be clear, concise, engaging and maximize the chance to meet the goal. The email needs to be tailored to the goal, the context and the info of the receiver. The goal of the email is {[Goal of the email]:To schedule a virtual call and discuss opportunity to collaborate}. My context is {[Email Context]:I'm the founder of a startup called flowGPT, the largest LLM prompt sharing platform for users to share, find, explore and use different LLM prompts.  We've launched 3 months and have had hundreds of thousands users, thousands of prompt engineers and a 50%+ MoM growth rate.}. The receivers' information is {[receiver's information]:The founder of Anthropic. It is an AI safety and research company. It owns Claude, the top 3 best LLM model in the world.}
input1: Goal of the email: To schedule a virtual call and discuss opportunity to collaborate. Email Context: I'm the founder of a startup called flowGPT, the largest LLM prompt sharing platform for users to share, find, explore and use different LLM prompts. We've launched 3 months and have had hundreds of thousands users, thousands of prompt engineers and a 50%+ MoM growth rate. Receiver's information: The founder of Anthropic, an AI safety and research company that owns Claude, one of the top 3 best LLM models in the world.
input2: Goal of the email: To schedule a virtual call and discuss opportunity to collaborate. Email Context: I'm the founder of flowGPT, a startup that has quickly become the largest platform for sharing and discovering LLM prompts, boasting hundreds of thousands of users and a 50%+ month-over-month growth rate since our launch just three months ago. Receiver's information: The founder of Anthropic, a leading AI safety and research organization known for developing Claude, one of the top three LLM models globally.
input1_ans:
Subject: Exploring Collaboration Opportunities Between flowGPT and Anthropic

Dear [Receiver's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am the founder of flowGPT, the largest LLM prompt sharing platform that empowers users to share, find, explore, and utilize a diverse range of LLM prompts. In just three months since our launch, we have attracted hundreds of thousands of users and thousands of prompt engineers, achieving a remarkable 50%+ month-over-month growth rate.

Given Anthropic's commitment to AI safety and your impressive work with Claude, I believe there is a unique opportunity for our platforms to collaborate. By combining our strengths, we could enhance the user experience for both our communities and drive innovation in the LLM space.

I would love to schedule a virtual call to discuss this potential collaboration further. Please let me know your availability in the coming weeks, and I will do my best to accommodate.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Founder, flowGPT  
[Your Contact Information]  
[Your LinkedIn Profile or Website]

Subject: Opportunity for Collaboration

Dear [Receiver's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am the founder of flowGPT, the largest platform dedicated to sharing, finding, exploring, and utilizing various LLM prompts. Since our launch just three months ago, we have experienced remarkable growth, with hundreds of thousands of users and thousands of prompt engineers joining our community, achieving a 50%+ month-over-month growth rate.

I am reaching out to explore the possibility of collaborating with Anthropic. Given your leadership in AI safety and research, particularly with Claude being one of the top LLM models globally, I believe there is a significant opportunity for us to work together to enhance the capabilities and reach of both our platforms.

I would love to schedule a virtual call at your convenience to discuss this potential collaboration further. Please let me know your availability, and I will do my best to accommodate.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
flowGPT  
[Your Contact Information]
input2_ans:
Subject: Exploring Collaboration Opportunities Between flowGPT and Anthropic

Dear [Receiver's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am the founder of flowGPT, the largest platform dedicated to sharing and discovering LLM prompts. In just three months since our launch, we have attracted hundreds of thousands of users and experienced a remarkable 50%+ month-over-month growth rate.

Given Anthropic's commitment to AI safety and your impressive work with Claude, I believe there is a unique opportunity for our organizations to collaborate. By combining our strengths, we could enhance the accessibility and effectiveness of LLM prompts while ensuring safety and ethical considerations are at the forefront.

I would love to schedule a virtual call to discuss this potential collaboration further. Please let me know your availability in the coming weeks, and I will do my best to accommodate.

Looking forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Founder, flowGPT  
[Your Contact Information]  
[Your LinkedIn Profile or Website]

Subject: Opportunity for Collaboration

Dear [Receiver's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. My name is [Your Name], and I am the founder of flowGPT, the largest platform dedicated to sharing and discovering LLM prompts. Since our launch just three months ago, we have experienced remarkable growth, with hundreds of thousands of users and a month-over-month growth rate exceeding 50%.

I am reaching out to explore potential collaboration opportunities between flowGPT and Anthropic. Given your leadership in AI safety and research, particularly with the development of Claude, I believe there is significant synergy between our missions that could lead to innovative advancements in the LLM space.

I would love to schedule a virtual call at your convenience to discuss this further. Please let me know your availability, and I will do my best to accommodate.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
flowGPT  
[Your Contact Information]
